entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing rain or freezing drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain near noon. Freezing rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
